comments:
On replacing a DOM element with another new read-only element via IDOMElement#replaceChild API, I got "java.lang.Error: intentionally not implemented since should never be called".

Here is the test case:
   IDOMDocument doc = model.getDocument();
   IDOMElement a = (IDOMElement)doc.createElement("a"); //$NON-NLS-1$
   a.appendChild(doc.createTextNode("text node")); //$NON-NLS-1$
   doc.appendChild(a);
   
   IDOMElement b = (IDOMElement)doc.createElement("b"); //$NON-NLS-1$
   b.appendChild(doc.createElement("c")); //$NON-NLS-1$
   b.setEditable(false, true);

   doc.replaceChild(b, a); // You'll see the error here!
 <-- end of code -->

Exception:
java.lang.Error: intentionally not implemented since should never be called
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.StructuredDocumentRegionProxy.getRegions(StructuredDocumentRegionProxy.java:181)

   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.ReadOnlyController.getDataSpan(ReadOnlyController.java:94)
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.ReadOnlyController.lockNode(ReadOnlyController.java:244)
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.NodeContainer.syncChildEditableState(NodeContainer.java:511)
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.ElementImpl.setEndStructuredDocumentRegion(ElementImpl.java:1320)
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.XMLModelUpdater.replaceChild(XMLModelUpdater.java:1516)
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.DOMModelImpl.childReplaced(DOMModelImpl.java:188)
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.NodeContainer.notifyChildReplaced(NodeContainer.java:357)
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.NodeContainer.insertBefore(NodeContainer.java:298)
   at org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.document.NodeContainer.replaceChild(NodeContainer.java:481)
   at ...
